016
017package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.yaml;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.Configuration;
020import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.MappedConfiguration;
021import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.file.AbstractFileConfiguration;
022import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.serializer.ConfigurationSerializer;
023import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.serializer.Serializer;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
026import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.Unmodifiable;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions;
029import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
030import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
031import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.Constructor;
032import org.yaml.snakeyaml.representer.Representer;
033
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.io.InputStream;
036import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
037import java.nio.file.Files;
038import java.nio.file.OpenOption;
039import java.nio.file.Path;
040import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
041import java.util.Collections;
042import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Objects;
046import java.util.Set;
047import java.util.function.Supplier;
048
049/**
050 * A class that implements {@link Configuration} for Yaml file.
051 * <p>
052 * This class can load from or save to Yaml file.
053 * <p>
054 * In the internal, this manages keys and values in {@link MappedConfiguration}.
055 */
056public class YamlConfiguration extends AbstractFileConfiguration {
057
058    private static final Supplier<Yaml> DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER = YamlConfiguration::createYaml;
059
060    private static @NotNull Yaml createYaml() {
061        var dumperOptions = new DumperOptions();
062        dumperOptions.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
063
064        var representer = new Representer(dumperOptions);
065        representer.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
066
067        var loaderOptions = new LoaderOptions();
068
069        var constructor = new Constructor(LinkedHashMap.class, loaderOptions);
070
071        return new Yaml(constructor, representer, dumperOptions, loaderOptions);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}.
076     *
077     * @param path the path to load or save
078     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
079     */
080    @Contract("_ -> new")
081    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path) {
082        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER));
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path} and other {@link Configuration}.
087     *
088     * @param path  the path to load or save
089     * @param other the other {@link Configuration}
090     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
091     */
092    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
093    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Configuration other) {
094        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER), other);
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}
099     * and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
100     *
101     * @param path         the path to load or save
102     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
103     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
104     */
105    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
106    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier) {
107        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier));
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path},
112     * other {@link Configuration}, and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
113     *
114     * @param path         the path to load or save
115     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
116     * @param other        the other {@link Configuration}
117     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
118     */
119    @Contract("_, _, _ -> new")
120    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier, @NotNull Configuration other) {
121        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier), other);
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Loads from {@link InputStream} using {@link Yaml#loadAs(InputStream, Class)}.
126     *
127     * @param input the {@link InputStream} to load
128     * @return the loaded {@link Configuration}
129     */
130    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
131    public static @NotNull Configuration loadFromInputStream(@NotNull InputStream input) {
132        var map = createYaml().loadAs(input, LinkedHashMap.class);
133        return MappedConfiguration.create(map);
134    }
135
136    private final ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal;
137    private Configuration config;
138
139    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal) {
140        super(path);
141        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
142    }
143
144    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal, @NotNull Configuration other) {
145        super(path);
146        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
147        this.config = MappedConfiguration.create(other);
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public @Nullable Object get(@NotNull String path) {
152        return config != null ? config.get(path) : null;
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
157        if (config == null) {
158            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
159        }
160
161        config.set(path, value);
162    }
163
164    @Override
165    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<String> getKeyList() {
166        return config != null ? config.getKeyList() : Collections.emptyList();
167    }
168
169    @Override
170    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Object> getValues() {
171        return config != null ? config.getValues() : Collections.emptySet();
172    }
173
174    @Override
175    public @Nullable Configuration getSection(@NotNull String path) {
176        return config != null ? config.getSection(path) : null;
177    }
178
179    @Override
180    public @NotNull Configuration getOrCreateSection(@NotNull String path) {
181        if (config == null) {
182            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
183        }
184
185        return config.getOrCreateSection(path);
186    }
187
188    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
189    @Override
190    public <T> void setList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<T> list, @NotNull Serializer<T, ?> serializer) {
191        if (serializer instanceof ConfigurationSerializer) {
192            serializer = new ToMap<>((ConfigurationSerializer<T>) serializer);
193        }
194
195        super.setList(path, list, serializer);
196    }
197
198    @Override
199    public void clear() {
200        if (config != null) {
201            config.clear();
202            config = null;
203        }
204
205        setLoaded(false);
206    }
207
208    @Override
209    public @NotNull YamlConfiguration copy() {
210        var copied =
211                config != null ?
212                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal, config) :
213                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal);
214
215        copied.setLoaded(isLoaded());
216
217        return copied;
218    }
219
220    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
221    @Override
222    public void load() throws IOException {
223        clear();
224
225        if (!Files.isRegularFile(getPath())) {
226            return;
227        }
228
229        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
230        Map<Object, Object> map;
231
232        try (var reader = Files.newBufferedReader(getPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
233            map = yaml.loadAs(reader, LinkedHashMap.class);
234        }
235
236        config = MappedConfiguration.create(map);
237
238        setLoaded(true);
239    }
240
241    @Override
242    public void save() throws IOException {
243        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
244
245        var map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
246
247        if (config != null) {
248            for (var key : config.getKeyList()) {
249                map.put(key, config.get(key));
250            }
251        }
252
253        var parent = getPath().getParent();
254
255        if (parent != null) {
256            Files.createDirectories(parent);
257        }
258
259        OpenOption[] options = {StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.WRITE, StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING};
260
261        try (var writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(getPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, options)) {
262            yaml.dump(map, writer);
263        }
264    }
265
266    @Override
267    public boolean equals(Object o) {
268        if (this == o) return true;
269        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
270        YamlConfiguration that = (YamlConfiguration) o;
271        return yamlThreadLocal.equals(that.yamlThreadLocal) && Objects.equals(config, that.config);
272    }
273
274    @Override
275    public int hashCode() {
276        return Objects.hash(yamlThreadLocal, config);
277    }
278
279    @Override
280    public String toString() {
281        return "YamlConfiguration{" +
282                "yamlThreadLocal=" + yamlThreadLocal +
283                ", config=" + config +
284                '}';
285    }
286
287    /**
288     * Gets the loaded {@link Configuration}.
289     *
290     * @return the loaded {@link Configuration}
291     * @throws IllegalStateException if this configuration is not loaded
292     */
293    public @NotNull Configuration getLoadedConfiguration() {
294        if (config != null) {
295            return config;
296        } else {
297            throw new IllegalStateException("this configuration is not loaded");
298        }
299    }
300
301    private static class ToMap<T> implements Serializer<T, Map<Object, Object>> {
302
303        private final ConfigurationSerializer<T> serializer;
304
305        private ToMap(@NotNull ConfigurationSerializer<T> serializer) {
306            this.serializer = serializer;
307        }
308
309        @Override
310        public @NotNull Map<Object, Object> serialize(@NotNull T input) {
311            return MappedConfiguration.convertToMap(serializer.serialize(input));
312        }
313
314        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
315        @Override
316        public @Nullable T deserialize(@NotNull Object source) {
317            if (source instanceof Map) {
318                return serializer.deserializeConfiguration(MappedConfiguration.create((Map<Object, Object>) source));
319            } else {
320                return null;
321            }
322        }
323    }
324}
